Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Currently, University is being invaded by Banktania.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: We are unsure why but don't have to time to find out.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: We must defend University before all 5 regions fall.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: With your help as the Academic Advisor, we'll take back University!

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Please select a Department Leader and choose a mission.
